name: Telegraph's Brownsville Girl
description: This bright and fruity cocktail is pitch perfect for the season. Tart apple from the calvados and the vegetal bite of celery bitters make a great team.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine white vermouth, calvados, lemon juice, and celery shrub bitters in a mixing glass. Add ice and stir until chilled. Strain into an Old Fashioned glass and serve immediately, straight up.
